Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services

Interface BillService

All Known Implementing Classes:
BillServiceImpl
@Service public interface BillService
Service interface for managing bills.

This interface defines the business logic for bill operations, including adding, retrieving, and searching bills.

  • Method Details

    • addBill

      BillResponseDTO addBill(BillRequestDTO billRequestDTO, Long idUser)
      Adds a new bill.
      Parameters:
      billRequestDTO - The DTO containing the bill information.
      idUser - the user id.
      Returns:
      The response DTO for the newly added bill.

    • findAllBill

      List<BillResponseDTO> findAllBill()
      Retrieves all bills.
      Returns:
      A list of bill response DTOs.

    • getAllBill

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<BillResponseCompleteDTO> getAllBill(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable, BillFilterDTO billFilterDTO)
      Parameters:
      pageable - the pagination information.
      billFilterDTO - all the filters.
      Returns:
      a paginated list of BillResponseCompleteDTO objects.

    • findAllBillByDate

      List<Bill> findAllBillByDate(Period period, BillType billType, CategoryBill categoryName)
      Retrieves all bills for a specific month and year.
      Parameters:
      period - The period object containing the date.
      billType - The type of bill to filter by.
      categoryName - The category name to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of Bill objects matching the criteria.

    • findAllBillByYear

      List<BillResponseByDateDTO> findAllBillByYear(Integer year, String billType, String categoryName)
      Retrieves all bills for a specific year.
      Parameters:
      year - The year to filter bills by.
      billType - The type of bill to filter by (optional).
      categoryName - The category name to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of BillResponseByDateDTO objects.

    • addReferenceLiquidationExpensesDetail

      Bill addReferenceLiquidationExpensesDetail(Long billId, Long liquidationExpensesDetailId)
      Adds a reference of liquidation expenses detail to a bill.
      Parameters:
      billId - The ID of the bill to update.
      liquidationExpensesDetailId - The ID of the liquidation expenses detail to associate.
      Returns:
      The updated Bill entity.

    • findAllBillGroupByCategoryTypeAndPeriod

      List<LiquidationExpensesDetail> findAllBillGroupByCategoryTypeAndPeriod(Period period, BillType billType)
      Finds all bills grouped by category type within a specified period.
      Parameters:
      period - The period to filter bills by.
      billType - The type of bill to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of LiquidationExpensesDetail grouped by category type.

    • cleanReferenceLiquidationDetail

      void cleanReferenceLiquidationDetail(LiquidationExpensesDetail liquidationExpensesDetail)
      Cleans up the reference of the given LiquidationExpensesDetail in the related bills.
      Parameters:
      liquidationExpensesDetail - The LiquidationExpensesDetail to be disassociated.

      BillResponseDTO changeStatus(BillStatusUpdateDTO statusUpdateDTO, Long idUser)
      Changes the status of a bill.
      Parameters:
      statusUpdateDTO - The DTO containing the bill ID and the new status to update.
      idUser - the user id.
      Returns:
      The response DTO with the updated bill details.

    • hasBillsForPeriod

      Boolean hasBillsForPeriod(Period period)
      Checks if there are any active bills associated with the specified period.
      Parameters:
      period - the Period for which to check the existence of active bills.
      Returns:
      true if there are active bills for the given period, false otherwise.

    • addEmployeeBill

      EmployeeBillResponseDTO addEmployeeBill(EmployeeBillRequestDTO employeeBillRequestDTO, Long idUser)
      Adds a new employee bill after validating the provided data. Converts the saved bill entity to an EmployeeBillResponseDTO and returns it.
      Parameters:
      employeeBillRequestDTO - .
      idUser - the user id.
      Returns:
      EmployeeBillResponseDTO containing the created employee bill details.

    • validStartDateInPeriod

      Boolean validStartDateInPeriod(LocalDateTime date, Long periodId)
      valid if the date selected is before startDate in period Selected.
      Parameters:
      date - .
      periodId - .
      Returns:
      true if date selected is before StartDate in period.

    • reportByPeriod

      List<InfoReportPeriod> reportByPeriod(Period period, BillType billType)
      Generates a report for the specified financial period.
      Parameters:
      period - The financial period for which the report should be generated.
      billType - The bill type to filter the report by.
      Returns:
      A list of InfoReportPeriod objects containing the report data for the specified period, including aggregated metrics related to bills within that period.

    • getReportForPeriods

      List<InfoReportPeriod> getReportForPeriods(List<Long> periodIds, BillType billType)
      Generates a report for multiple periods, bill information based on the specified bill type.
      Parameters:
      periodIds - A list of period IDs for which to generate the report.
      billType - The bill type to filter the report by.
      Returns:
      A list of InfoReportPeriod objects.

    • getAllSupplierReport

      List<SupplierAmountDto> getAllSupplierReport(List<Long> periodIds, BillType billType)
      Retrieves a report of supplier amounts for the specified periods and bill type.
      Parameters:
      periodIds - A list of period IDs to filter the report.
      billType - The bill type to filter the suppliers by.
      Returns:
      A list of SupplierAmountDto objects containing the supplier details and amounts.

    • getAllSupplierReportWithNoAgrupattion

      List<SupplierAmountDto> getAllSupplierReportWithNoAgrupattion(List<Long> periodIds, BillType billType)
      Retrieves a report of all suppliers with their respective amounts for the specified periods and bill type, without any grouping or aggregation.
      Parameters:
      periodIds - List of period IDs to filter the bills.
      billType - The bill type to filter the bills.
      Returns:
      A list of SupplierAmountDto.

    • calculateTotalAmount

      BigDecimal calculateTotalAmount(List<InfoReportPeriod> extraordinaryReports)
      Calculates the total amount from a list of extraordinary reports.
      Parameters:
      extraordinaryReports - the list of InfoReportPeriod
      Returns:
      the total amount as a BigDecimal

    • calculateAverage

      BigDecimal calculateAverage(List<InfoReportPeriod> extraordinaryReports)
      Calculates the average value from a list of extraordinary reports.
      Parameters:
      extraordinaryReports - the list of InfoReportPeriod
      Returns:
      the average value as a BigDecimal

    • calculatePercentage

      Float calculatePercentage(List<InfoReportPeriod> extraordinaryReports)
      Calculates the percentage from a list of extraordinary reports.
      Parameters:
      extraordinaryReports - the list of InfoReportPeriod
      Returns:
      the percentage as a Float

    • categoriesResumeReport

      PeriodDataDTO categoriesResumeReport(List<Long> ids, BillType billType)
      Retrieves the top 5 categories report for specified periods and bill type, including total amount, percentage, and average amount.
      Parameters:
      ids - List of period IDs.
      billType - Bill type filter.
      Returns:
      A PeriodDataDTO with the summarized categories report.

    • categoriesResumeReport

      PeriodDataDTO categoriesResumeReport(List<Long> ids)
      Retrieves the top 5 categories report for specified periods, without bill type filter.
      Parameters:
      ids - List of period IDs.
      Returns:
      A PeriodDataDTO with the summarized categories report.
